attributes.action: Make children learn english as the first language before school age
attributes.background: Education is being waisted for English children because the teachers are to busy focusing on the children that dont speak the language. It should be a rule that children must speak English as their first language before applying for a school place, to keep education alive for the English students

rejection.details:
We';re not sure what you mean by requiring children to speak English as a "first" language. You could start a new petition calling for children to have to demonstrate that they have a specific standard of English before they can be accepted at school. 

You'll need to give your full name to start a petition.
